author: times news cr
title: Buy Oppo Reno 11 5G worth Rs 30,000 for Rs 6600, sale started on Flipkart - 2024-04-11 23:23:03 - TIme News
text:
2024-04-11 23:23:03
Oppo Smartphones prove to be a good option in every respect. If you are also searching for a new smartphone then Oppo Reno 11 5G is going to be a good phone for you. Also today we are going to tell you about the ongoing discount offers on it. With its help it will also become easier for you to buy the phone. Besides, it will also be available quite cheap.
You can buy OPPO Reno11 5G (256GB + 8GB RAM) from Flipkart. The MRP of this phone is Rs 40,999 and you can order it after 26% discount for Rs 29,999. Even if we talk about bank offers, you are going to get this phone very cheap. You can also get separate discount on doing Flipkart UPI.
Bumper discount available under exchange offer-
If we talk about the heaviest discount, you will get it under the exchange offer. If you return your old smartphone to Flipkart, you can get a discount of Rs 23,399. But to get this much discount, the condition of your old phone should be good and it also depends on the model of the old phone. If you also get this discount then you can include it in your list today itself.
Amazing features are available in the phone-
You donâ€™t need to think too much about the specifications. The phone has a 6.7 Inch Full HD+ Display. It also has a triple rear camera, 50MP+8MP+32MP camera is going to be available. 32MP Front Camera is available. Due to 5000 mAh battery, you also get good battery backup. Due to Mediatek Dimensity 7050 Processor, the speed is also quite good. 1 year warranty and 6 months accessories warranty is being given in the phone.
